mapper.insert: insert into e_outbound_entry( outbound_entry_id, shipment_date, creation_date, total_amount, delivery_method, invoice_type, tax_rate, drawer, partner_company_id, department_id, warehouse_id, remark, classification, shipping_cost, shipping_cost_type, shipping_quantity, shipping_number, shipping_method_id ) values ( #{outboundEntryID}, #{shipmentDate}, date('now', 'localtime'), #{totalAmount}, #{deliveryMethod}, #{taxRate}, #{invoiceType}, #{drawer}, #{partnerCompanyID}, #{departmentID}, #{warehouseID}, #{remark}, #{classification}, #{shippingCost}, #{shippingCostType}, #{shippingQuantity}, #{shippingNumber}, #{shippingMethodID} )
mapper.select: select outbound_product_id, outbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial, is_presale from e_outbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where outbound_entry_id = #{id} order by outbound_product_id

select outbound_product_id, outbound_entry_id, sku_id, quantity, stock_quantity, remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial, is_presale from e_outbound_product where warehouse_stock_id = #{id} and is_presale = 1 order by outbound_entry_id, outbound_product_id

select outbound_product_id, p.outbound_entry_id, sku_id, quantity, stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, p.warehouse_id, p.tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, is_presale from e_outbound_entry as e join e_outbound_product as p on e.outbound_entry_id = p.outbound_entry_id where warehouse_stock_id = #{id} and e.shipment_date >= #{date} order by outbound_product_id

select outbound_entry_id, shipping_cost, shipping_cost_type, shipping_number, shipping_method_id, c.abbreviated_name as relevant_company_name, i.remark from e_outbound_entry as i join c_relevant_company as c on i.shipping_method_id = c.relevant_company_id where outbound_entry_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update e_outbound_entry set shipping_cost = #{shippingCost}, shipping_cost_type = #{shippingCostType}, shipping_quantity = #{shippingQuantity}, shipping_number = #{shippingNumber}, shipping_method_id = #{shippingMethodID}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where outbound_entry_id = #{outboundEntryID}
mapper.select: select outbound_entry_id, total_amount, invoice_type, tax_rate, drawer, i.department_id, d.name as department_name, i.remark from e_outbound_entry as i join e_department as d on i.department_id = d.department_id where outbound_entry_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update e_outbound_entry set total_amount = #{totalAmount}, delivery_method = #{deliveryMethod}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, department_id = #{departmentID}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where outbound_entry_id = #{outboundEntryID}

update e_outbound_product set quantity = #{quantity}, remark = #{remark}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, unit_price_without_tax = #{unitPriceWithoutTax}, unit_price_with_tax = #{unitPriceWithTax} where outbound_product_id = #{outboundProductID}
mapper.select: select outbound_product_id, outbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial from e_outbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where p.checkout_serial = #{checkoutSerial} order by outbound_product_id

select outbound_product_id, outbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial from e_outbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where p.invoice_serial = #{invoiceSerial} order by outbound_product_id

select i.outbound_entry_id, i.shipment_date, i.creation_date, i.delivery_method, i.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name as company_abbreviated_name, c.phone, c.full_name, i.remark, i.classification, i.shipping_cost, i.shipping_cost_type, i.shipping_quantity, i.shipping_number, i.shipping_method_id, r.abbreviated_name as relevant_company_name, i.shipping_cost_serial from (e_outbound_entry as i join c_partner_company as c on i.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id) left join c_relevant_company as r on i.shipping_method_id = r.relevant_company_id where i.shipping_cost_serial = #{shippingCostSerial} order by i.outbound_entry_id desc

select c.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name, c.full_name, p.quantity, p.unit_price_with_tax from (e_outbound_entry as e join e_outbound_product as p on e.outbound_entry_id = p.outbound_entry_id) join c_partner_company as c on e.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where p.checkout_serial = ''

select c.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name, c.full_name, p.quantity, p.unit_price_with_tax from (e_outbound_entry as e join e_outbound_product as p on e.outbound_entry_id = p.outbound_entry_id) join c_partner_company as c on e.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where p.invoice_serial = '' and p.checkout_serial != ''

select outbound_product_id, outbound_entry_id, p.sku_id, sku_full.code, sku_full.unit_name, sku_full.factory_code, quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, warehouse_stock_id, warehouse_id, tax_rate, unit_price_without_tax, unit_price_with_tax, stock_unit_price, return_status, checkout_serial, invoice_serial from e_outbound_product as p join sku_full on p.sku_id = sku_full.sku_id where p.warehouse_stock_id = #{id} order by outbound_product_id

select e.outbound_entry_id, e.shipment_date, p.outbound_product_id, p.sku_id, p.quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.warehouse_stock_id, p.warehouse_id, p.unit_price_without_tax, p.stock_unit_price, p.is_presale from e_outbound_entry as e join e_outbound_product as p on e.outbound_entry_id = p.outbound_entry_id where warehouse_stock_id = #{id}

select e.outbound_entry_id, p.outbound_product_id, p.sku_id, s.code, s.unit_name, s.factory_code, p.quantity, p.stock_quantity, p.remark, p.warehouse_stock_id, p.warehouse_id, p.tax_rate, p.unit_price_without_tax, p.unit_price_with_tax, p.stock_unit_price, p.return_status, p.checkout_serial, p.invoice_serial, e.partner_company_id, cpc.abbreviated_name, cpc.phone, cpc.full_name, cpc.remark from e_outbound_entry as e join e_outbound_product as p on e.outbound_entry_id = p.outbound_entry_id join sku_full as s on p.sku_id = s.sku_id join c_partner_company cpc on e.partner_company_id = cpc.partner_company_id where p.is_presale = 1
